meanings.definition: A group of organic compounds derived from ammonia in which one or more hydrogen atoms are replaced by methyl groups.
meanings.sent1: The methylamines are used in various industrial processes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the properties of methylamines in laboratories.
meanings.sent3: The methylamines decided to throw a party in the chemistry lab.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like methylamines in a garden of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The smell of methylamines lingered in the air, reminding him of his chemistry experiments.
